items.sentence: No one has time for that kind of thing anymore.
Nobody can do that as well as me, not even Tom.
I didn\'t even know Tom used to live in Boston.
I didn\'t expect her to ask me such a question.
What you\'re suggesting doesn\'t seem feasible.
Tom said he couldn\'t provide any more details.
Tom said he didn\'t know anything about Boston.
Tom said he didn\'t know what Mary looked like.
What\'s the strangest thing you\'ve ever eaten?
Tom earns about $300 a month working part time.
